alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 20 at 1:14PM PDT until October 21 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TO 11 PM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In California, far eastern Modoc County including the Warner Mountains. In Oregon, far Eastern Klamath County and most of Lake County. * WHEN...From 2 PM to 11 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected over the higher terrain, along highway 31 near Summer Lake, and exposed areas of highway 395 from Lakeview northward. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County
